data.name: Happy Empire 2 – The Lost Relic
data.detailed_description:
We are proud to present our new game – Happy Empire 2 – The Lost Relic. In this strategy/adventure game, Princess Leya, Prince Hervald and their servants search for ancient relics that were lost during the last war. To find those powerful relics, the prince will have to make a journey and find rare caves. He will have to manage his resources smart and cooperate with different characters. And he will face a lot of challenges and obstacles on his way.

This game will touch feeling of both boys and girls. Arcana and challenges are intertwined in a single story of the Lost Relic game.

Defeat the Evil Wizard! Progress in your challenging search and struggle for Empire!

More About the Game:


  • Colorful graphics
  • Mysterious Relics!!!
  • Game as part of a big story with rich storyline
  • 4 amazing worlds to visit
  • 64 challenging achievements
  • 81 unique levels

data.short_description: Find mysterious relics inside an ancient chamber and progress through the Empire by using the power of those relics. Unite the Empire! Defeat the Evil Wizard and return home victorious!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
